name: R5-allergyintolerance-verification-for-R4B
title: Cross-version VS for R5.AllergyIntoleranceVerificationStatus for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergyintolerance-verification|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R5 to R4B.
